Workflow.Description: Thomas Cook Group Companies Marketing Terms & Condtions

label.description: Thomas Cook Group Companies Marketing Terms & Condtions

The Thomas Cook group companies that may use your data for marketing purposes are: For travel and travel related products and services: Thomas Cook Retail Limited trading as Thomascook.com Thomas Cook Tour Operations Limited trading as Thomas Cook, Airtours, Signature, Flexibletrips, Club 18-30, Thomas Cook Sport, Thomas Cook City Escapes, Thomas Cook Cruise and Stay and Manos TCCT Retail Limited trading as The Co-operative Travel and Thomas Cook Thomas Cook Airlines Limited Thomas Cook Airlines Scandinavia A/S – Airshoppen to send you marketing information about flights and in-flight services such as Thomas Cook Airlines’ online duty free shop, Airshoppen For financial products/services such as insurance, travel money and personal finance solutions: Thomas Cook Money Limited Thomas Cook Retail Limited TCCT Retail Limited Thomas Cook Airlines Limited Thomas Cook Airlines Scandinavia A/S – Airshoppen to send you marketing information about flights and in-flight services such as Thomas Cook Airlines’ online duty free shop, Airshoppen
